alert.note: Alert for White Pine (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 13 at 4:28PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Nevada, including the following county, White Pine. * WHEN...Until 730 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 428 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This is causing small stream flooding. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.2 to 0.4 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of North Central White Pine County - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
